lang.dontShowMeThisMessageAgain: Don't show me this message again
lang.directions: Click on a red hotspot in the schematic or on an item in the Equipment menu to see corresponding lubricant information. To view more of the schematic, click and drag with your mouse or use the arrow keys on your keyboard.
lang.touchModeQuestion: It appears you’re using a touch-enabled device. Would you prefer to use the touch-optimized interface?

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.information: Premium-quality electric motor bearing grease
products.benefits: Helps extend bearing life to improve electric motor reliability

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ 100
products.information: High performance synthetic greases for electric motor bearings
products.benefits: Long grease life and bearing protection helping increase motor reliability

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600
products.information: Synthetic gear, bearing and circulating oil
products.benefits: Improves equipment productivity due to reduced unscheduled downtime and maintenance; long gear and bearing life under high-stress operating conditions; extended oil life; improved energy efficiency compared to mineral oils

products.name: Mobilgear SHC™
products.information: Synthetic EP gear and bearing oils
products.benefits: Outstanding load-carrying and anti-wear properties to assist with improving equipment reliability and life; can replace grease in some applications; high viscosity index and low traction properties helps improve equipment energy efficiency compared to mineral oils

products.name: Mobilgear™ 600 XP
products.information: Premium-quality gear oil
products.benefits: Micropitting performance, bearing protection, and seal compatibility helps to improve gearbox performance and life

products.name: Mobilith SHC™
products.information: High-performance synthetic greases for lubrication of bearings
products.benefits: Excellent wear protection of components; easy start-up at low temperature; extended regreasing interval--reduced service cost

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™
products.information: Greases intended for wide variety of applications in severe operating conditions including many industrial sectors
products.benefits: Excellent adhesion and cohesion properties; high mechanical stability helps provide extended relubrication intervals; helps to resist water intrusion; helps to  aid in improving equipment reliability

products.name: Mobilarma™ 798
products.information: Premium wire rope lubricant and rust preventative
products.benefits: Prevents corrosion of wire ropes over a wide temperature range and in harsh environments

products.name: Mobil Delvac 1™
products.information: Fully synthetic supreme performance heavy duty diesel (and mixed fleet) engine oil
products.benefits: Helps extend engine life while providing long drain capability

products.name: Mobil Delvac™ 1300 Super
products.information: Extra high performance diesel engine oils that help extend engine life in the most severe on and off-highway applications while delivering outstanding performance in modern, high-output, low-emission engines including those with Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR) and after treatment systems with Diesel Particulate Filters (DPFs) and Diesel Oxidation Catalysts (DOCs)
products.benefits: Reduces low temperature sludge build up and high temperature dePosits; lower oil costs due to less make-up oil during operation; excellent low temperature pumpability; long life of critical wear surfaces

products.name: Mobil Delvac MX™
products.information: High performance diesel engine oils that help extend engine life in the most severe on and off-highway applications while delivering outstanding performance in modern, high-output, low-emission engines including those with Exhaust Gas Recirculation (EGR) and after treatment systems with Diesel Particulate Filters (DPFs) and Diesel Oxidation Catalysts (DOCs)
products.benefits: Reduces low temperature sludge build up and high temperature dePosits; lower oil costs due to less make-up oil during operation; excellent low temperature pumpability; long life of critical wear surfaces

products.name: Mobiltrans™ HD
products.information: High performance transmission and drive train lubricants for powershift transmissions gearboxes and geardrives
products.benefits: Optimizes clutch friction retention and slippage control and compatibility with common clutch materials; high performance in wet brake applications helping to prevent brake chatter

products.name: Mobil Delvac Synthetic ATF™
products.information: Synthetic heavy duty automatic transmission fluid
products.benefits: Approved against Allison TES-295 specification; excellent fluid durability helps to provides long lasting performance and component protection

products.name: Mobil Multi-Vehicle ATF™
products.information: Synthetic blend automatic transmission fluid formulated for a wide variety of vehicles
products.benefits: Helps provide long fluid and transmission life and excellent lubricating characteristics for smooth and quiet transmission operation

products.name: Mobil Delvac Synthetic™ Gear Oil
products.information: Fully synthetic drivetrain lubricant
products.benefits: Load carrying capability; thermal and oxidative stability; shear stability; wear protection

products.information: High performance GL-5 and MT-1 commercial vehicle gear oil
products.benefits: High load carrying capability and protection from rust and corrosion for longer component life; wide temperature range and multi-purPose capabilities to help reduce number products and inventory.

products.benefits: Reduces low temperature sludge build up and high temperature dePosits; lower oil costs due to less make-up oil during operation; excellent low temperature pumpability; long life of critical wear surfaces

products.information: High performance monograde diesel engine oils
products.benefits: Extended TBN reserve reduces dePosit formation and helps to protect engines from corrosive wear

products.name: Mobil SHC Pegasus™
products.information: Leading edge gas engine oil providing excellent component protection and increased fuel efficiency
products.benefits: Advanced technology increase energy efficiency, lower fuel consumption, and lower emissions; keep clean performance and wear protection help extend component life

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 1
products.information: Synthetic natural gas engine oil
products.benefits: Proprietary formulation minimizes ash dePosits, piston land dePosits, liner scuffing, and valve seat and valve face wear; will flow at -40 ºC, ensuring good cold start-up properties and effective lubrication at cold temperatures

products.name: Mobil Pegasus™ 1005
products.information: Premium natural gas engine oil
products.benefits: Fewer oil changes help enables lower operating costs and higher productivity; helps to reduce dePosits in combustion chamber and pistons to maximize engine efficiency and reliability; helps to reduce dePosits in heat exchangers to maximize heat production; helps to minimize dePosits to help extend catalytic converter life; fewer lubricant purchases; helps to maximize engine reliability and performance
